# The `CmpPredicate` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An abstraction over a floating-point predicate, and a pack of an integer predicate with samesign information. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::CmpPredicate</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

An abstraction over a floating-point predicate, and a pack of an integer predicate with samesign information.

Some functions in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> construct and return this type in place of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a>.

Definition at line 22 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h">CmpPredicate.h</a>.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> getMatching instead to get the canonicalized matching <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmppredicate">CmpPredicate</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h">CmpPredicate.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getPreferredSignedPredicate() {#a6b25351cc1e7cf7fde5d97eadffad546}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="CmpInst::Predicate CmpPredicate::getPreferredSignedPredicate () const">
Attempts to return a signed <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> from the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmppredicate">CmpPredicate</a>.

If the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmppredicate">CmpPredicate</a> has samesign, return <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst/#a9d5f70171d811078c4d263811f13c121">ICmpInst::getSignedPredicate</a>, dropping samesign information. Otherwise, return the predicate, dropping samesign information.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h">CmpPredicate.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l03953">3953</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h">CmpPredicate.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l03957">3957</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.

### getMatching() {#a1c29fdc79aad7e92c7f850bbd0faa208}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; CmpPredicate &gt; CmpPredicate::getMatching (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmppredicate">CmpPredicate</a> A, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmppredicate">CmpPredicate</a> B)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Compares two CmpPredicates taking samesign into account and returns the canonicalized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmppredicate">CmpPredicate</a> if they match.

An alternative to operator==.

For example, samesign ult + samesign ult -&gt; samesign ult samesign ult + ult -&gt; ult samesign ult + slt -&gt; slt ult + ult -&gt; ult ult + slt -&gt; std::nullopt

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/cmppredicate-h">CmpPredicate.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l03938">3938</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
